1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import os
3 import numpy as np
4 import rospy
5 import rospkg
6 import tf
7 from gazebo_msgs.srv import SpawnModel, SpawnModelRequest, SetModelState, SetLinkState, GetLinkState
8 from gazebo_msgs.msg import ModelState, LinkState, Pose, Quaternion, Point
9 
10 import sys
11 sys.path.append(rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin'))
12 # import scripts.utils
13 from scripts.controllers.PandaController import PandaController # noqa: E402
14 from scripts.controllers.SawyerController import SawyerController # noqa: E402
15 
16 
17 class EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager():
18  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
19  """
20  Spawns the IMU model.
21 
22  Arguments
23  ---------
24  `model_names`: `List[str]`
25  The model names for the IMU
26 
27  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
28  `[Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]`
29 
30  `sdf`: `bool`
31  launch from sdf or urdf
32  """
33  self.model_names = model_names
34  self.n = len(model_names)
35  self.sdf = sdf
36  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
37 
38  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
39  if sdf:
40  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
41  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
42  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
43  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
44  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
45  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
46  else:
47  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
48  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
49  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
50  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
51  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
52  xml_string = f.read()
53 
54  if init_poses is None:
55  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
56  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
57  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
58  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
59  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
60 
61  self.init_poses = init_poses
62  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
63  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
64 
65  def spawn(self):
66  """
67  Spawns the IMU model with the poses defined earlier in
68  `__init__`
69  """
70  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
71  try:
72  self.req.model_name = model_name
73  init_pose = Pose()
74  init_pose.position.x = pose.position[0]
75  init_pose.position.y = pose.position[1]
76  init_pose.position.z = pose.position[2] + 0.91488
77  init_pose.orientation.x = pose.orientation[0]
78  init_pose.orientation.y = pose.orientation[1]
79  init_pose.orientation.z = pose.orientation[2]
80  init_pose.orientation.w = pose.orientation[3]
81  print(init_pose)
82  self.req.initial_pose = init_pose
83  res = self.spawn_model(self.req)
84  print(res)
85  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
86  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
87 
88  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
89  """
90  Sets the poses of the IMU.
91 
92  Arguments
93  ---------
94  `names`: `List[str]`
95  The names of the IMUs
96 
97  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
98  The poses of the IMUs
99  """
100  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
101  self.set_pose(name, pose)
102 
103  def set_pose(self, name, pose):
104  """
105  Sets a pose of an IMU
106 
107  Arguments
108  ---------
109  `name`: `str`
110  The name of the IMU
111 
112  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
113  The pose of the IMU
114  """
115  if self.sdf:
116  try:
117  state_msg = ModelState()
118  state_msg.model_name = name
119  state_msg.pose = pose
120  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
121  res = self.set_model_state(state_msg)
122  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
123  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
124  else:
125  try:
126  link_msg = LinkState()
127  link_msg.link_name = name
128  link_msg.pose = pose
129  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
130  res = self.set_link_state(state_msg)
131  print(res)
132  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
133  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
134 
135 
136 class TrueIMUBoxStateManager():
137  def __init__(self, names):
138  """
139  TrueIMUBoxStateManager class.
140 
141  Arguments
142  ---------
143  `names`: `List[str]`
144  The names of the IMUs
145  """
146  self.names = names
147  self.n = len(names)
148 
149  self.get_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/get_link_state', GetLinkState)
150  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/get_link_state')
151 
152  def get_poses(self):
153  """
154  Gets the poses of the given links
155 
156  """
157  poses = np.zeros((self.n, 7))
158  for i, name in enumerate(self.names):
159  resp = self.get_link_state(name, 'world')
160 
161  if resp.success:
162  pose = resp.link_state.pose
163  poses[i, :] = np.r_[pose.position, pose.orientation]
164 
165  return poses
166 
167 
168 def load_estimated_poses(filename):
169  """
170  Loads the poses
171 
172  Arguments
173  ---------
174  `filename`: `str`
175  The filename to get the `np.array`
176  """
177  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
178  return np.loadtxt(os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'data', filename))
179 
180 
181 if __name__ == '__main__':
182  # rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions")
183  n_joint = 7
184  n_imu = 7
185 
186  robot = sys.argv[1]
187  filename = sys.argv[2]
188 
189  if robot == 'panda':
190  controller = PandaController()
191  elif robot == 'sawyer':
192  controller = SawyerController()
193  else:
194  raise ValueError("Must be either panda or sawyer")
195 
196  poses = load_estimated_poses(filename)
197  positions = np.zeros(poses.shape[0])
198  controller.publish_positions(positions, sleep=1)
199 
200  imu_names = ['imu_link0', 'imu_link1', 'imu_link2',
201  'imu_link3', 'imu_link4', 'imu_link5', 'imu_link6']
202  link_names = ['panda::'+imu_name for imu_name in imu_names]
203  panda_imu_manager = TrueIMUBoxStateManager(link_names)
204  defined_poses = panda_imu_manager.get_poses()
205 
206  # Set initial poses
207  model_names = ['imu%i' % (i) for i in range(n_imu)]
208  init_poses = [Pose(position=pose[:3], orientation=pose[3:]) for pose in poses]
209  state_manager = EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager(model_names, init_poses)
210  state_manager.spawn()
211 
212  error = np.linalg.norm(defined_poses - poses)
213  print(error)
